nodes.bodyText: Unnecessary diff
That's auto formatting again. Usually there's just an empty line between usual imports and static ones. With all due respect, do you have any notes on the actual code?
Actual code seems good. (to me atleast)
Unnecessary diff
Auto formatting. There was 4 black spaces on this empty line.
Why did you change that?
Auto formatting. I've checked the projects, turns out mostly there's a line break after annotations. Since there's no clear code style I decided to keep it this way. If you mind, I can revert.
Please turn off auto formatting and keep a minimal diff when working on Essentials PRs. Reverting it would be ideal. 😄
Waiting on #3701 to rebase.

no rush, PRs usually take a little while before merging anyways
happy oktoberfest still 😄
This whole file is full of changes like this. I don't see any reason behind this
Oh my, that's my IDE settings with native-to-ascii conversion. Fixed!
please keep this to one line

I don't see any line lengths/wrapping guidelines in #3701, so I used common sense here -- wrapped everything which was above 120 symbols. A successful build indicates that no checkstyle rule was violated. I don't mind applying required length if there's any project-scope preference, not a personal opinion.
@md678685, any thoughts on this?
Pretty sure the Essentials code doesn't split lines unless creating a builder class, I could be wrong however.

Yeah just as a convention, I don't think Essentials normally wraps lines. Just because no checkstyle rule was violated (it was also added extremely recently) doesn't mean we can't still discuss it. 😄 Maybe let MD comment on this since he's managing those rules but I think one line is more correct here as far as I know.
@mdcfe bump?
One line is preferable where possible - many of these line breaks feel arbitrary.
please keep this to one line
Please sort this alphabetically
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -973,3 +973,4 @@ years=years
 youAreHealed=\u00a76You have been healed.
 youHaveNewMail=\u00a76You have\u00a7c {0} \u00a76messages\! Type \u00a7c/mail read\u00a76 to view your mail.
 xmppNotConfigured=XMPP is not configured properly. If you do not know what XMPP is, you may wish to remove the EssentialsXXMPP plugin from your server.
+consoleName=Console

please keep this to one line
@JRoy what's wrong with inline variables?
You don't need to declare another variable here when you're just going to declare and use it once

Ah, nvm, I see.
I've extracted it coz the line was too long and it's easier to read. But whatevs.
